Container.Name: android-tv-background
Container.Overview: Docker for adelatour11's androidtvbackground. Create background wallpapers from Plex/TMDB/Trakt. Useful to use with alternative android tv launchers such as Projectivy[br] See full instructions: https://github.com/ninthwalker/androidtvbackground#docker-install-instructions[br]
Container.Requires: Toggle 'Basic View' to Advanced to see the **Extra Parameters** section. Set *--user uid:gid* to the uid:gid you use on volumes you are mapping for this docker.
Container.Changes: 31JAN2025[br] - Rebase image to Alpine[br] - Update to use docker --user uid:gid[br] 30JAN2025:[br] - Initial Docker Release

Config.Name: PLEX Backgrounds
Config.Description: Set to True to enable PLEX backgrounds

Config.Name: TMDB Backgrounds
Config.Description: Set to True to enable TMDB backgrounds

Config.Name: TRAKT Backgrounds
Config.Description: Set to True to enable TRAKT backgrounds

Config.Name: CRON Schedule
Config.Description: Set to a cron expression to create backgrounds automatically

Config.Name: Post Python Script
Config.Description: Set to True to run a custom python script

Config.Name: Post Shell Script
Config.Description: Set to True to run a custom shell script

Config.Name: Backgrounds Path
Config.Description: Path where backgrounds will be saved
